title: Get Help from Auntie Ethel
content:
tell you to mind your own business. she continues to tell you that she is aware of your parasite. This will give you the following dialogue options.

How do you know that? That's none of your concern. Don't change the subject. Why is that woman really here?

Getting Help from Auntie Ethel

Choosing dialogue 1 will have auntie Ethel tell you that shes aware by the smell of it and offers you her help to get it out. This will give you the following dialogue options.

I know a devil that's offered
